list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pull or rip (something) apart or to pieces with force.
move very quickly in a reckless or excited manner.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she tore along the footpath on her bike
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô xé đi lối đi bộ trên xe đạp của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: be in a state of uncertainty between two conflicting options or parties.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was torn between his duty and his better instincts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta bị giằng xé giữa nhiệm vụ của mình và bản năng tốt hơn của anh ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hole or split in something caused by it having been pulled apart forcefully.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a tear in her dress
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một giọt nước mắt trong chiếc váy của cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a drop of clear salty liquid secreted from glands in a person's eye when they cry or when the eye is irritated.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a tear rolled down her cheek
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một giọt nước mắt lăn xuống má cô
